summary:
{
  "summary": "A suite of unit tests that validate the correctness and robustness of a range of numeric utilities, covering absolute values, type conversions, trigonometric calculations, cumulative operations, exponential and logarithmic transforms, hashing, histogram creation, precision handling, seeded random number generation, string conversion error handling, value counting, and detection of undefined numeric values.",
  "business_intent": "To ensure that core numeric functions behave as expected in all scenarios, providing confidence in mathematical computations for downstream applications and maintaining data integrity across the software stack.",
  "keywords": [
    "numeric",
    "unit testing",
    "math functions",
    "validation",
    "precision",
    "random number generation",
    "error handling",
    "statistical utilities",
    "type casting",
    "NaN detection"
  ]
}
```
